main.name: Full-stack developer
main.bio: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience in Java/JS, Angular,Vue, React. Proven ability to lead and execute on large-scale web projects,from conception to launch. Specializes in developing high-performance,cross-browser compatible user interfaces using the latest technologies.

work.title: Full-stack Developer
description: Develop and maintain front-end code using Javascript, Angular, React.
Developed indexed database architecture using SQL procedures and triggers for 10 different applications
Worked with Core Java and Node to develop automated solutions to include web interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Web services.
Develop microservices using SpringBoot and Node for B2B e-commerce and mobile app server

work.title: Backend Developer
description: Develop and maintain web application using JavaScript, Java Spring,MongoDB
Designed and implemented big data processing architectures
Increased company revenue by 20% within 2 months after developing and implementing business logic for over 20 features
Wrote many unit tests to verify functionality of back-end processing
